title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump from deploying troops in Portland
items.description: Oregon officials had challenged President Donald Trump’s move to send troops to the state’s largest city, calling it “patently unlawful.”

items.title: FBI, ADL split shows Trump admin is de-prioritizing right-wing violence, scholars say

items.title: Democrats are fretting about New Jersey governor's race
items.description: Top Democrats are increasingly alarmed the party could lose the governor's race in traditionally blue New Jersey next month because of a series of stu...

items.title: Bad Bunny's Super Bowl backlash part of history for Latino performers at sports events
items.description: Bad Bunny 's Super Bowl pushback from MAGA influencers is the latest chapter in a long history of Latino artists facing heat on America's most signifi...

items.title: MAGA wages campaign to redefine "hate" after Kirk killing
items.description: MAGA activists have launched a crusade against two of the nation's most storied civil rights watchdogs, accusing them of smearing conservatives as ext...

items.title: Exclusive — Trump on Gaza deal push: "I said, 'Bibi, this is your chance for victory'"

items.title: Many American Jews sharply critical of Israel on Gaza, Post poll finds
items.description: Most Jews say Israel is committing war crimes — and 39 percent say genocide — while often distinguishing between the country and its leadership.

items.title: Democrats’ defiance on shutdown shows a new, tougher approach to Trump
items.description: After eight months of getting battered by Republicans, the party has largely abandoned efforts at conciliation or outreach.

items.title: Republicans threaten return to Musk’s chainsaw strategy to government
items.description: Rather than sticking to an easy strategy, Republicans are threatening a risky strategy of mass firings of federal workers because of the government sh...

items.title: Trump sees shutdown as tool to shrink government, target foes
items.description: The president’s failure to achieve funding for his border wall in 2018 shutdown informed his less compromising strategy this time.

items.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
items.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

items.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
items.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

items.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
items.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

items.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

items.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
items.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

items.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
items.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

items.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
items.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
